title: Define System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level architecture for the Piezoelectric Roadway system, including hardware and software components.

title: Design Sensor System
description: Specify the design and function of piezoelectric sensors that will measure pressure and vibration from vehicles.

title: Develop Power Management System
description: Create a system for managing and storing the electricity generated by the roadway.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system's design and operation.

title: Test Sensor Performance
description: Conduct tests to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the piezoelectric sensors.

title: Integrate Hardware and Software Components
description: Combine hardware (sensors, power management system) with software components to form a functional prototype.

title: Perform System Integration Tests
description: Test the fully integrated prototype for functionality and compatibility.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Identify potential security vulnerabilities in the system's hardware and software components.
